meanings.definition: The quality or state of being unstable.
meanings.sent1: The unstableness of the table made it wobble.
meanings.sent2: The unstableness of the ground caused the tower to sway.
meanings.sent3: The unstableness of the chair made it the favorite of the mischievous cat.
meanings.sent4: Her unstableness in decision-making was like a ship without a rudder.
meanings.sent5: The unstableness of the ladder made climbing it a risky endeavor.

meanings.definition: The condition of lacking stability or firmness.
meanings.sent1: The unstableness of the economy worried many people.
meanings.sent2: The unstableness of the relationship led to its eventual breakup.
meanings.sent3: The unstableness of the Jenga tower made everyone hold their breath.
meanings.sent4: His unstableness in commitments was like a kite without a string.
meanings.sent5: The unstableness of the bridge made crossing it a nerve-wracking experience.
